summary: I’m opening up fic commissions! Paying for college is rough, and I’m working to earn what my scholarships don’t cover. I’m...
body:
I’m opening up fic commissions! Paying for college is rough, and I’m working to earn what my scholarships don’t cover. I’m willing to write fics for BNHA right now, although I will also write for Bungou Stray Dogs if you’re interested. My specialty is angst but I’ll do fluff, crack, flangst, whatever! For writing samples, check out my ao3.

Prices:

  • $10 per 1000 words
  • Payment method: PayPal

What I will do:

  • BNHA or BSD fics
  • General (platonic) fics
  • Ship fics
  • My BNHA specialties are anything concerning:
    • The Todoroki family (including the Todoroki Dabi theory)
    • Dabihawks
    • Kiribaku
    • League of Villains
    • Uraraka or Shinsou-based fics
    • I am open to writing other characters/ships as well (exceptions listed below).
  • For BSD, my focus is Soukoku (Chuuya/Dazai)

What I won’t do:

  • NSFW, a/b/o, furry
  • Reader insert
  • Ships concerning Mineta, Endeavor, Overhaul, and romantic Bakudeku
    • I retain the right to refuse your request; please ask about your ship/fic premise before requesting a fic!

Rules:

  • The completed fic will be posted after payment
    • Let me know whether you would like your fic posted privately or publicly
  • If I go above your requested word count, that’s on me! No extra payment necessary.
  • Current word count limit is 5000 words
  • Fic completion can be expected within 1-2 weeks (or earlier) and will be put in order by request
    • i.e., if you are the third commissioner, your request will be placed in a queue to be worked on only after I have completed the requests of the first and second

If you’re interested, DM me on tumblr! Signal boosts for this post are greatly appreciated!

blog.name: faketextsfromlastmight
blog.title: Fake texts from last Might
blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary:
Midoriya Izuku : You won't kill me... You aren't capable of it.
Shigaraki Tomura : Really? Let's put that to the test.
Midoriya...
body:
Midoriya Izuku : You won't kill me... You aren't capable of it.
Shigaraki Tomura : Really? Let's put that to the test.
Midoriya Izuku : Oh, but if you kill me, who will watch your Let's Plays? Your livestreams? Your reviews? Your unboxings? No one. That's right, I know who you are... @supersmashmouthultimate!
Shigaraki Tomura : @tekkenforgranted?!!! [sobbing] You son of a bitch... YOU SON OF A BITCH!!!

blog.name: quirky-hero-imagines
blog.title: BNHA Imagines
blog.description:
Heyo! Another imagines and writing BNHA blog because there can never be enough💕 INBOX IS CLOSED [33]

Masterlist

FAQ Rules

summary: Do you still do the nsfw alphabet? If so can I get an a-z for Mirio?
question: Do you still do the nsfw alphabet? If so can I get an a-z for Mirio?
answer:
Thank you for sending a request ❤️

I’m indeed still doing the nsfw alphabet!

Be warned ‼️Smut/Lemon‼️


A= Aftercare (What they’re like after sex)

Mirio would be so loving, placing kisses all over your body and telling you how amazing you are. He praises you so much that it makes you blush.


B= Body part (their favorite body part of theirs and also their partner’s)

Mirio’s favorite body part of his is his mouth because he’s proud of the smile that he can always maintain, just like his idol.

His favorite body part of yours is definitely your eyes, every emotion is reflected in them and Mirio can never get enough of seeing them.


C= Cum

Mirio loves to cum inside you if you let him. He wants to feel as close to you as possible and this lets him experience that.


D= Dirty secret

Mirio secretly gets hard when you praise him. He’s so goal driven and it makes him feel so good when you validate it.


E= Experience (how experienced are they? Do they know what they’re doing?)

Mirio has some experience, being pretty popular with girls.
